nodes.text: Buggo was a male member of Lourna Dee's Tempest and a Strike working under Cloud Ultident Margrona during the High Republic Era. He was the husband of Margrona's second cousin. Buggo was present at the Raid on Elphrona around 232 BBY. He was killed at the hands of Jedi Indeera Stokes while she was rescuing Ronn Blythe from Margrona's starship.
